question: Why did you choose to apply to universities in the United States?
How did you hear about the specific program you are applying to?
How will this program help you achieve your future career goals?
What are your plans after completing your studies in the US?
How do you plan to fund your education in the United States?
Have you received any scholarships or financial aid?
Do you have any family or friends currently living in the United States?
What are your ties to Nepal?
Why did you choose this particular university over others?
What are your expectations of living in the United States?

Besides tuition, what other expenses have you considered for your stay in the US (e.g., living, travel, health insurance)?
How do you plan to maintain your F-1 visa status throughout your studies?
What are your housing plans in the US, and have you already made arrangements?

What aspects of American culture are you most curious about experiencing?
